description: A Flutter UI screen widget named RunHistoryScreen that displays a list of saved run records with statuses, timestamps, and summary details. It fetches data asynchronously, formats timestamps into relative times, and style elements with Electric Orange-themed styling. The class includes internal methods for rendering status icons/colors and handles navigation to detailed results screens.

classes.name: RunHistoryScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the list of previous runs with interactive UI elements, styled according to Electric Orange theme.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state by fetching the list of runs asynchronously.

methods.name: _formatTimestamp
methods.description: Converts a timestamp in milliseconds to a human-readable relative time string.

methods.name: _statusColor
methods.description: Returns a color based on the overall status of a run.

methods.name: _statusIcon
methods.description: Returns an icon based on the overall status of a run.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for displaying the list of run history, including styling and tap interactions.
